name: Home - #HENdonesia
description: my bittersweet feelings towards this country. considering that in the past few years there has been more and more deforestation everywhere, fires, illegal logging, hunting, animals and indigenous peoples are evicted from their homes, and also criminalize indigenous peoples just for picking cassava on their ancestral lands. In fact, all of this is happening more and more often during this never-ending pandemic situation. this chaotic feeling that always comes when contemplating the state of this country. Have we really been free from colonialism?
